alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:57PM EDT until July 17 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL POWELL...ESTILL...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sandhill, or near Irvine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Irvine around 500 PM EDT. Willow Tree around 505 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cottage Furnace, Knowlton and Rogers Chapel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
